unlimitedtrade.gui.title: Unlimited Trade Mod - %s
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.name: open Config Gui
unlimitedtrade.config.openConfigGui.comm: Set the shortcut key to open the setting interface
unlimitedtrade.config.startTrade.name: startTrade
unlimitedtrade.config.waitChunkDebug.com:
If you need a more stable transaction, please install the ChunkDebug module on the server
 to prevent the transaction from being loaded and causing the transaction to be invalid
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.name: drop Block List
unlimitedtrade.config.dropBlockList.comm: Limit the type of items that are automatically thrown
unlimitedtrade.config.maxUseRetries.name: Maximum number of post-transaction retries
unlimitedtrade.config.maxUseRetries.comm: Set max post-trade action max attempts
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.n: Disable Entity End Gateway Chunk Ticket
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.d: Disables forced chunk loading of exit chunk when entities teleport through the End Gateway
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayAnyTicket.e: Affects all entities including mobs, items, and Ender Pearls regarding chunk loading on teleport
carpet.rule.disableEndGatewayPlayerTicke: Disable Player End Gateway Chunk Ticket
Disables forced chunk loading of exit chunk only for players teleporting through the End Gateway
Only affects players; target chunk won't be force-loaded after teleport
Does not affect other entities such as mobs, items, or Ender Pearls
Helps restore the legacy void trading mechanism
Enable enablePersistentTradingScreen rule as well to use legacy void trading
carpet.rule.enablePersistentTradingScree: Restores the old behavior allowing continuous trading with villagers even if their chunk is unloaded
When enabled, the trading screen remains open even if the villager's chunk is not loaded
Trading screen closes normally when the player dies or manually closes the interface
Helps restore legacy void trading mechanism
Enable disableEndGatewayPlayerTicket rule as well to use legacy void trading
